Dataset.Name: RSNA 2018 Pneumonia Detection Challenge

Author.Name: George Shih, MD
Author.Address: Department of Radiology, Weill Cornell Medical College, 525 E 68th St, Box 141, New York, NY 10065 USA

Organization.Name: Radiological Society of North America
Organization.Address: 820 Jorie Blvd, Suite 200, Oak Brook, IL 60523 USA

Reference.Authors: Shih G, Wu CC, Halabi SS, Kohli MD, Prevedello LM, Cook TS, Sharma A, Amorosa JK, Arteaga V, Galperin-Aizenberg M, Gill RR, Godoy MCB, Hobbs S, Jeudy J, Laroia A, Shah PN, Vummidi D, Yaddanapudi K, Stein A
Reference.Title: Augmenting the National Institutes of Health chest radiograph dataset with expert annotations of possible pneumonia

Dataset.Labeling: 18 radiologists from 16 different institutions, including 12 chest radiologists from the STR, Mean of 10.6 years of experience (age range, 3-35 years), Scope of annotation (e.g., multi-institutional)
Dataset.Confidentiality: Manual review of images to exclude PHI

Training.Comments: 30,000 frontal view chest radiographs from the 112,000-image public National Institutes of Health (NIH) CXR8 dataset: 16,248 posteroanterior views, 13,752 anteroposterior views
